attributes.action: Stop the Bias Condemn the Slaughter of Innocents and the Terror inflicted on the already oppressed people of Palestine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pathetic and disgaceful attitude taken by the Pm and his Foereign Secretary, I believe, is nothing short of culpability in the slaughter of innocents, to date 800 people have died, the majority innocent, already oppressed people with no rights in their own land. Enough. Stop the US/UK justification of the atrocities. NOT IN MY NAME

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
